element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm creates a new vector layer with gradient lines from a raster layer representing a continuous field, such as a DEM.

element.name: MIN
element.text: minimum size of each gradient line, in map units

element.name: MAX
element.text: maximum size of each gradient line, in map units.

element.name: SKIP
element.text: If it is equal to 1, it will create one line for each cell, if it is 2, it will add 1 for each 4 cells, and so on

element.name: LINES
element.text: Vector lines layer with two fields on the attributes table: * Slope * Aspect
